info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 12:28PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Vermilion Parish through 1245 PM CDT... At 1228 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pecan Island. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pecan Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
